note.p: Education: Went to Portugal to study, aged 11 (1637)

Career: Served in the Portuguese Restoration War; Grand Carver to the King of Portugal; Colonel of the City Guard of Lisbon; founder and Secretary, Academia dos Generosos, Lisbon; Governor of Évora; Deputy of the Junta of the Three States; Guard-Mor of Torre do Tombo, Castelo de São Jorge (1668-1690)
Honours: Commander of the Order of Christ
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Oldenburg, IV, p. 314-6; Wikipedia; Biography of D. Luís da Cunha, by Isabel Cluny
